# Privacy Policy

This privacy policy describes how COMPUTO collects, uses, and shares your personal information when you visit our website.

## Information We Collect

- **Usage Data**: We collect information about how you interact with our website, including pages visited, time spent, and referring website.
- **Personal Information**: If you submit content or contact us, we may collect your name, email address, and institutional affiliation.

## How We Use Information

We use the information we collect to:
- Improve our website and content
- Communicate with authors and readers
- Process article submissions and reviews
- Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience

## Data Security

We take reasonable measures to protect the information we collect from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse.

## Cookies

We use cookies to understand how our site is used. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

## Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. The current version will always be posted on this page.

## Contact Us

If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at [contact@COMPUTO](mailto:contact@COMPUTO).
